original_text: The head of the statue was made of pure gold, its chest and arms of silver, its belly and thighs of bronze,
korean_text: 그 우상의 머리는 순금이요 가슴과 두 팔은 은이요 배와 넓적다리는 놋이요

sentences.original_text: The head of the statue was made of pure gold
its chest and arms of silver
its belly and thighs of bronze
